synopsis.text: This anime special, "Ajin: Demi-Human," unveils a series of untold stories that revolve around the characters' lives, beyond what was shown in the TV series and films. The first episode, "The Shinya Nakamura Incident," dives into the Ajin Control Committee's most dreaded scenario, revealing the truth behind the country's first Ajin. The second episode offers a unique glimpse into the characters' everyday lives, showcasing unexpected and candid moments that might just turn into your guilty pleasure. Lastly, the third episode, "Satou: Zero," explores Satou's past, including his time in Africa when he captured the first Ajin and discovered his own demi-human nature. These specials are bundled with the limited editions of the manga's eighth, ninth, and tenth volumes.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
